channel.title: Node.js on Flora's
channel.description: Recent content in Node.js on Flora's

item.title: Node.js Error Message Resolved
item.description: So I had encountered these Error Messages when running a project: npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE npm ERR! errno 1 npm ERR! grpc@1.10.1 install: `node-pre-gyp install --fallback-to-build --library=static_library` npm ERR! Exit status 1 npm ERR! npm ERR! Failed at the grpc@1.10.1 install script. npm ERR! This is probably not a problem with npm. There is likely additional logging output above. npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in: npm ERR!
